headlines.headline: Why Stephen A. isn’t buying Harden’s comments on leaving Clippers for Cavs
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith questions James Harden’s reasoning behind his move from Los Angeles to Cleveland.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Live updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: What's the latest on a potential Giannis Antetokounmpo trade? Catch up on what we're hearing from insiders ahead of Thursday's deadline.

headlines.headline: Which NBA rookies have scored the most points in a game?
headlines.description: Wilt Chamberlain holds the record for the most points scored by an NBA rookie in a single game, with 58 in 1960. Check out other top scorers now.

headlines.headline: Would Draymond Green be a good fit with the Lakers?
headlines.description: Iman Shumpert discusses the abilities of Draymond Green and whether he'd be a good addition for the Lakers ahead of the trade deadline.

headlines.headline: Windy: Not seeing a lot of momentum on a Giannis trade before deadline
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst provides the latest on the Giannis Antetokounmpo trade buzz, expressing doubt the Bucks' star will be moved before the trade deadline.

headlines.headline: Windy: James Harden trade 'all about money'
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst breaks down the Clippers trading James Harden to the Cavaliers for Darius Garland.

headlines.headline: Super Bowl picks: Predicting Seahawks-Patriots score, MVP

headlines.headline: Ghostbusters: Back Darnold, Seahawks to exorcise some demons in Super Bowl LX
headlines.description: Liz Loza advises not to underestimate the revenge factor as Sam Darnold and the Seahawks face their New England demons in the Super Bowl

headlines.headline: 49ers' Christian McCaffrey wins 2025 Salute to Service award
